text: Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn e Kraisɨn mɨn ovenge, egha faragha en suighizir biziba, e da ataki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses Osirizir Araziba uam en suirazir puvatɨ, e fɨriaghɨre. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn en ingangarir e amiba, da ua Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn, Godɨn Duam e gamima e tuavir igiamɨn gɨn ghua ingangarim gami.
